casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina ex rel., William G. ROSS, Jr., Secretary, North Carolina Dept. of Environmental and Natural Resources, Division of Waste Management, Plaintiffs,
v.
Jay CARTER, a/k/a William Joseph Carter, a/k/a William Joseph Carter, IV, a/k/a William Joseph Carter, Sr., Defendant. No. COA15-629. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. March 15, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed in Part; Dismissed in Part.
